text: The 1938 Invercargill mayoral by-election was held on 19 October 1938 to elect the Mayor of Invercargill after the death of John Miller on 20 September. Miller had been elected to a fourth consecutive term in May. ==Background== Ralph Hanan was elected to council in 1935 and became deputy mayor in May 1938. ==Results== The following table gives the election results: ==References== Category:1938 elections in New Zealand Category:Mayoral elections in Invercargill
title: 1938 Invercargill mayoral by-election
